       int time)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a manager instance
        Parameters:
        lower - a lower bound on the number of nodes
        upper - an upper bound on the number of nodes
        cmaker - the class of the Maker
        cbreaker - the class of the Breaker
        time - the time allowed for a turn
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
